original_title: Vapnet - en berättelse om tidens gång
overview: Lydia, Lorenzo and Augustine work at Minerva, a space station in Earth orbit. The station is the most important part of a defense system that helps to maintain world peace. One day, the three get a new directive: World War. Disagreements arise and the key question becomes: what is our individual responsibility?
title: The Weapon - A Tale of Passing Time
